altername_name: Pachi-Slot Teiou 7 - Maker Suishou Manual Vol. 1 - Beat the Dragon 2, Lupin Sansei, Hot Rod Queen
name: Pachi-Slot Teiou 7: Maker Suishou Manual 1: Beat the Dragon 2, Lupin Sansei, Hot Rod Queen
overview: Pachi-Slot Teiou 7 - Maker Suishou Manual 1: Beat the Dragon 2 - Lupin Sansei - Hot Rod Queen is a pachi-slot (gambling machine) game that features a perfect recreation of the 3 gambling machines of the same name with different levels of zoom.
